on reading compounds: 竿【カン】counter for poles, rods, etc.
竿頭【カントウ】top of a pole
一竿【イッカン】one pole (esp. used for fishing poles), one rod
kun reading compounds: 竿【さお】rod, pole, neck (of a shamisen, etc.), shamisen, beam (i.e. the crossbar of a balance), single line (esp. as a flying formation for geese), penis, counter for flags (on poles), counter for long, thin Japanese sweets (e.g. youkan)
竿姉妹【さおしまい】women who have had sex with the same man, pole sisters
殻竿【からざお】flail (for threshing grain)
